summary: This is as REAL as it gets. The water is immersively REflective realer than most new gen. games. the sky is as blue and the sunset is dynamic as our own, the god rays are godly, and the grass is greener or less greener depending on where you are.
descriptionHtml:
[center][/center][left][/left][size=6]This is only [/size][color=#ffff00][size=4][u][i][b]two files[/b][/i][/u][/size][/color][size=6] in size. How you might ask? It only includes the [/size][size=4][u][b][i][color=#ffff00]ENBseries.ini[/color][/i][/b][/u] [/size][size=6]file which contains all the adjustments and the [/size][color=#ffff00][size=4][u][i][b]ENBpalette.BMP[/b][/i][/u][/size][/color][size=6] this is used to Shade the world and everything.[/size]

[size=6]So Steps to install this...[/size]
[size=4] 1. Go out and find an ENBpreset and install it.
2. Download these two flies from URE.
3. Go to the Steam/steamapp/common/skyrim folder...
4. Replace the file ENBseries.ini from the other ENB with the ENBseries.ini that was just downloaded from URE.
5. Now Open the ENBseries Folder and replace the ENBPalette.BMP with the one from URE.


So many of you are probably like well that is just lazy as F*** piggy backing off someone else's ENB. YES and NO. these are the only two files that i actually made and im actually reusing my ENBpalette from the last ENB i made cuz it's a better shade mapping image. the actually ENBseries.INI file is high quality and versatile. 

[/size][size=6]The point i'm trying to make is maybe that ULTRA realistic ENB that many of us want isn't something we can do alone, this will be a collaborative piece of art.

Mixing and matching different ENB presets this HERESY!!! YUP, but isn't the point to make the game look and feel better?


[font=Lucida Sans Unicode]Alright so what do these two files do when combined with other enbs?
[/font]well why don't you come find out.


***ANYONE WHO WANTS TO IMPROVE THIS ENB AND TAKE THIS FURTHER YOU HAVE THAT PERMISSION
LETS MAKE CUSTOM WEATHERS BASED ON CITY, SETTLEMENT, HOLD, KINGDOM, AND REGION.
LETS MAKE FX BETTER AND MORE DYNAMIC
MAKE THE COLOR MORE PALE, MORE CONTRAST, MORE DYNAMIC AS YOU TRAVEL. LET THE COLOR CHANGE WITH THE SKY COVERAGE, OR THE SUNSET, OR SUNRISE.
YOUR CHARATCTER SHOULD BE THE BEST LOOKING CHARACTER IN THE BEST LOOKING LIGHT
IT IS TIME TO MAKE REFLECTIONS SO REAL THAT WE CAN FINALLY SEE OUR CHARACTER IN THE WATER.***  [/size]
author: Saajix811
